title: Want to watch a Smurf test New Builds and Strategies?
body:
I reached top 400 early this season, and want to try smurfing on a Silver account.

Are you interested in watching a Diamond 2-3 play on Smurf to test out New and Unique builds, while testing different strategies?

I will keep commentary educational, answering any questions and open to any discussions about strats that "break the meta". 

We can become a different way to look at League. Can also duo with viewers.

replies.body: So like off meta? Or just new builds that come up and you would like to try them?
